taggyDownload.head: Download Taggy
taggyDownload.description: To enjoy the best experience with Taggy, we invite you to download our application.
taggyDownload.list1: If your device is an IOS, open Taggy in Safari.
taggyDownload.list2: Tap the Share icon at the bottom of the screen.
taggyDownload.list3: Scroll down in the Share menu and select "Add to Home Screen".
taggyDownload.list4: Tap "Add" in the top right corner of the screen.
taggyDownload.list5: Taggy will be added to your home screen and you can access it like any other native app.
